title: Warrant Affidavit
description: Generate an affidavit for various types of warrants.

form.name: submission_subject
form.label: Subject/Location
form.placeholder: e.g., John Doe or 1234 Imagination Ave

form.name: submission_crimes
form.label: Suspected Crimes
form.placeholder: FC. 115 Evading a Peace Officer, FA. 201 Capital Murder

form.name: pc_initial_event
form.label: Initial Event/Discovery
form.placeholder: Describe the initial event or discovery.

form.name: pc_investigative_steps
form.label: Subsequent Investigative Steps
form.placeholder: e.g., witness interviews, evidence collection, surveillance

form.name: pc_key_evidence
form.label: Key Evidence
form.placeholder: e.g., informant tips, physical evidence, or preliminary forensic results

form.name: pc_conclusion
form.label: Evidence Conclusion
form.placeholder: Explain what the evidence shows and how it links the subject/location to the crime.

modifiers.name: introduction
modifiers.label: Affiant Introduction
modifiers.generateText: I, {{officers.0.rank}} {{officers.0.name}} (#{{officers.0.badgeNumber}}), am a peace officer employed with the {{officers.0.department}}, currently assigned to the {{officers.0.divDetail}}.{{#or introduction_years introduction_experience}} I {{#if introduction_years}}have been employed by this agency for {{introduction_years}} years{{/if}}{{#and introduction_years introduction_experience}} and {{/and}}{{#if introduction_experience}}have extensive experience in {{introduction_experience}}{{/if}}.{{/or}}

modifiers.name: submission_statement
modifiers.label: Submission Statement
modifiers.generateText: I submit this affidavit in support of a{{#or (eq warrant_type 'Arrest Warrant') (eq warrant_time 'Electronic Search Warrant')}}n{{/or}} {{warrant_type}} for {{submission_subject}}. This request is based on an ongoing investigation{{#if submission_crimes}} into the following crimes: {{submission_crimes}}{{/if}}.

modifiers.name: probable_cause
modifiers.label: Probable Cause Statement
modifiers.generateText:
The following facts establish probable cause for this warrant:
On {{pc_date}} at approximately {{pc_time}}, {{pc_initial_event}}. This was followed by {{pc_investigative_steps}}. Evidence gathered, including {{pc_key_evidence}}, indicates that {{pc_conclusion}}.

modifiers.name: scope_of_request
modifiers.label: Scope of Request

modifiers.name: conclusion
modifiers.label: Conclusion
